casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Justin Everett ROSE. No. 296P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of June 2005 by Sam Bridges to Withdraw as Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of June 2005."
